SEARCH
Package net.chaossquad.mclib.scheduler

Klasse Task

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.scheduler.Task
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
OneTimeTask, RepeatingTask
public abstract class Task extends Object
A task for the TaskScheduler. Can only be created by the TaskScheduler itself.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Task

      @Internal protected Task(long id, @NotNull @NotNull TaskScheduler scheduler, @NotNull @NotNull TaskRunnable runnable, @Nullable @Nullable Removable removeCondition, @Nullable @Nullable String label)
      Creates a task.
      Parameter:
      id - id
      scheduler - task scheduler
      runnable - runnable
      removeCondition - remove condition
      label - label

  • Methodendetails

    • run

      @Internal public final void run()
      This will run the task. This does not check any conditions, so only use it if you know what you are doing!

    • onRun

      protected abstract void onRun()
      This method is called when the task scheduler runs the task.

    • shouldRun

      public abstract boolean shouldRun()
      This method is called when the task scheduler checks if the task should be executed or not
      Gibt zurück:
      true = should be executed, false = do not execute

    • inheritedRemoveCondition

      protected abstract boolean inheritedRemoveCondition()
      This method is called when the task scheduler checks if the task should be removed.
      Gibt zurück:
      true = task scheduler should remove the task, false = do not remove

    • getId

      public final long getId()
      Returns the task id.
      Gibt zurück:
      task id

    • getScheduler

      public final TaskScheduler getScheduler()
      Returns the task scheduler.
      Gibt zurück:
      task scheduler

    • isMarkedForRemoval

      public boolean isMarkedForRemoval()
      Returns if the task has been marked for removal. If the task is marked for removal, it will no longer execute. This method does not return if the task has been or should be removed. If you want to check if the task has been or should be removed, use toBeRemoved().
      Gibt zurück:
      marked for removal

    • remove

      public void remove()
      Mark the task for removal.

    • isPaused

      public final boolean isPaused()
      Returns if the task is paused
      Gibt zurück:
      true = task paused

    • setPaused

      public final void setPaused(boolean paused)
      Sets the pause status of the task.
      Parameter:
      paused - paused status

    • toBeRemoved

      public final boolean toBeRemoved()
      Returns if the task should be removed. This is the case if it is marked for removal, the remove condition is true or the inherited remove condition is true.
      Gibt zurück:
      if the task should be removed

    • getLabel

      public final String getLabel()
      Returns the label which is like a task name.
      Gibt zurück:
      label

    • getRemoveCondition

      public final Removable getRemoveCondition()
      Returns the remove condition object.
      Gibt zurück:
      remove condition

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      toString in Klasse Object
